Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please
  • Enclosing interface:
    BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter
    public static class BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please
extends java.lang.Object
    Special value returned from BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.onEvent(HistoricalDataLogEvent) that determines if/how BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.HistoricalDataLogEvent.data() will get logged.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please andAmendData​(byte[] data)
      Last chance to amend or replace BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.HistoricalDataLogEvent.data() before it's written to the log.
      BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please andAmendEpochTime​(EpochTime epochTime)
      Last chance to amend or replace BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.HistoricalDataLogEvent.epochTime() before it's written to the log.
      BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please andLimitLogTo​(long logLimit)
      Calling this will crop the log to the given limit before BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.HistoricalDataLogEvent.data() is written.
      static BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please doNotLog()
      Will not log the data.
      byte[] getAmendedData()
      Returns the amended data provided through andAmendData(byte[]), or null if not applicable.
      EpochTime getAmendedEpochTime()
      Returns the amended epoch time provided through andAmendEpochTime(EpochTime), or EpochTime.NULL if not applicable.
      long getLimit()
      Returns the limit provided through andLimitLogTo(long), or Long.MAX_VALUE if not applicable.
      static BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please logToDisk()
      Will log the data to disk only, currently through SQLite.
      static BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please logToMemory()
      Will log the data to current app memory only.
      static BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please logToMemoryAndDisk()
      Will log the data to both memory and disk - combination of logToMemory() and logToDisk().

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getLimit

        public long getLimit()
        Returns the limit provided through andLimitLogTo(long), or Long.MAX_VALUE if not applicable.

      • getAmendedData

        public byte[] getAmendedData()
        Returns the amended data provided through andAmendData(byte[]), or null if not applicable.

      • getAmendedEpochTime

        public EpochTime getAmendedEpochTime()
        Returns the amended epoch time provided through andAmendEpochTime(EpochTime), or EpochTime.NULL if not applicable.

      • andAmendData

        public BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please andAmendData​(byte[] data)
        Last chance to amend or replace BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.HistoricalDataLogEvent.data() before it's written to the log.
        Returns:
        this so you can chain calls together.

      • andAmendEpochTime

        public BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please andAmendEpochTime​(EpochTime epochTime)
        Last chance to amend or replace BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.HistoricalDataLogEvent.epochTime() before it's written to the log.
        Returns:
        this so you can chain calls together.

      • andLimitLogTo

        public BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please andLimitLogTo​(long logLimit)
        Calling this will crop the log to the given limit before BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.HistoricalDataLogEvent.data() is written. So if you call this with 0 BleDevice.getHistoricalDataCount(java.util.UUID) will return 1 after this.
        Returns:
        this so you can chain calls together.

      • logToDisk

        public static BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please logToDisk()
        Will log the data to disk only, currently through SQLite. Data is preserved across app sessions until (a) the user uninstalls the app, (b) the user clears the app's data, or (c) you call one of the BleDevice.clearHistoricalData() overloads.

      • logToMemory

        public static BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please logToMemory()
        Will log the data to current app memory only. When the app is destroyed the data will be lost.

      • logToMemoryAndDisk

        public static BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please logToMemoryAndDisk()
        Will log the data to both memory and disk - combination of logToMemory() and logToDisk().

      • doNotLog

        public static BleNodeConfig.HistoricalDataLogFilter.Please doNotLog()
        Will not log the data.
